response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $15,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I believe this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
